title: USA Cycling Names Coach Who Nearly Beat Them in Paris to Lead Women’s Track to Los Angeles 2028
content:
Paul Manning brings gold-medal pedigree both as a racer and a coach as he takes over for the retiring Gary Sutton as USA Cycling already begins building for the 2028 Olympic Games.

Read the full article at USA Cycling Names Coach Who Nearly Beat Them in Paris to Lead Women’s Track to Los Angeles 2028 on Velo.
author: ahood
